name: C.M.Y.K
description:
C.M.Y.K is a local 2-4 player game.

Every player has a different colored light-disk and needs to push the green puck.

Once pushed, the green puck paints the playfield with the color of the last touched light-disk.

The player with the most colored pixels on screen wins.

Music

The music is made with an old-school Adlib tracker. So enjoy the tunes!


Instructions

The game supports keyboard and a varity of XBox360,PS2,SNES,USB-Controllers.

Player 1 - ←↑↓→ or Controller
Player 2 - w,a,s,d or Controller
Player 3 - Controller
Player 4 - Controller

Highscores are saved as screenshots under: %appdata%/LOVE/C.M.Y.K/

version: 1.0.10

If you like the game, please tweet or write an review.
